answers.answer: Hi, enzymes like SGOT and SGPT spill into the bloodstream with damage to the liver cells. For the high cholesterol your wife may be on medications this could increase the liver enzymes. The medications for diabetes can also elevate the liver enzymes. Consult your doctor regarding this, he may prescribe alternate medications. Regards.

question: My wife aged 47 years has got SGOT as 37 IU/L & SGPT as 19 IU/L. She is a diabetic for the last 16 years. She is obese also. Her Glycosylated Haemoglobin (HBA1C)  is 7.9 %, Triglyceride is 370 mg/dl, VLDL Cholesterol is 74 mg/dl & Hb. Are these the reasons? Suggest remedy for the containing SGOT to the desired level. Remedy for containing level to the desired range.
title: High SGOT
